sentences.sContent: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.sCn: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

sentences.sContent: ...announcing that the five-star rating system that Medicare developed in 2008 to help families compare nursing home quality also has little relationship to how satisfied its residents or their family members are...
...Dare to Compare Let's compare Ryan's and Tyler's meals to sec which is healthier...
...Perhaps the primary advantage is that they have the opportunities to compare prices of a product offered by different retailers...

remMethod.val: com(一起) ＋ pare(看作pair， 对) → 把这对一起比较 → 比较， 对照

trans.tranOther: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different
